text: Élvis Alves Pereira (born 23 August 1977, in São Paulo), is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a defender for Segunda Liga side Desportivo das Aves. ==External links== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from São Paulo Category:Association football defenders Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Associação Portuguesa de Desportos players Category:Goiás Esporte Clube players Category:Clube de Regatas Brasil players Category:União Agrícola Barbarense Futebol Clube players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:Leixões S.C. players Category:C.D. title: Élvis Alves Pereira
